charts

Class HistogramChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • charts.Chart
      • charts.HistogramChart

  • public class HistogramChart
extends Chart
    Histogram of the magnitude ranges of a list of earthquakes. Can receive a province as restriction or not.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class charts.Chart

        earthquakes, panel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HistogramChart(java.util.ArrayList<Earthquake> earthquakes)
      Sets the earthquakes to the parent constructor, sets the province restriction to null and calls to create the chart panel again.
      HistogramChart(java.util.ArrayList<Earthquake> earthquakes, Province province)
      Sets the earthquakes to the parent constructor, sets the province restriction and calls to create the chart panel again.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createChart()
      Creates the histogram.
      protected org.jfree.data.general.Dataset createDataSet()
      Creates the chart dataset by counting the total amount of frequencies in each magnitude range.

      • HistogramChart

        public HistogramChart(java.util.ArrayList<Earthquake> earthquakes)

    • Method Detail

      • createChart

        protected org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createChart()
        Creates the histogram.
        Specified by:
        createChart in class Chart
        Returns:
        the JFreeChart histogram

      • createDataSet

        protected org.jfree.data.general.Dataset createDataSet()
        Creates the chart dataset by counting the total amount of frequencies in each magnitude range. The ranges go from 0 to 11, divided by units of 1.
        Specified by:
        createDataSet in class Chart
        Returns:
        the histogram dataset
